sanskrit_verse:
अग्निहोत्रं च जुहुयादाद्यन्ते द्युनिशोः सदा ।
दर्शेन चार्धमासान्ते पौर्णमासेन चैव हि ॥ ४.२५॥
transliteration:
agnihotraṃ ca juhu-yād ādyante dyuniśoḥ sadā |
darśena cārdhamāsānte paurṇamāsena caiva hi || 4.25||
sph_interpretive_translation: One must perform the Agnihotra ritual at both dawn and dusk without fail; likewise, the Darsha and Purnima offerings at the fortnightly transitions.
